Name: Zuzu's Petals cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet with fragrant bison grass vodka and fruity Maraschino cherry flavours supported by bitter gentian, rich elderflower and lime juice.
History: Chaim Dauermann at The Up & Up, Greenwich Village, NYC, USA. The name references It's A Wonderful Life .
Nutrition: One serving of Zuzu's Petals cocktail contains 231 calories
